text: new paragraph elected budget committee attendance amend rsa by inserting after paragraph vi the following new paragraph for an elected budget committee all scheduled meetings shall be attended in person by all elected members except that participation in a meeting by electronic or other means of communication under rsa iii shall be permitted only if the budget committee finds extenuating circumstances and allows the participation any member of an elected budget committee who fails to attend or more scheduled and noticed meetings or percent of such meetings annually shall be considered to have created a vacancy in the elected position which shall be filled as provided in law new paragraph school boards duty to provide education attendance by members amend rsa by inserting after paragraph iv the following new paragraph for elected members of the school district board all scheduled meetings shall be attended in person by all elected members except that participation in a meeting by electronic or other means of communication under rsa iii shall be permitted only if the school board finds extenuating circumstances and allows the participation any elected member of a school board who fails to attend or more scheduled and noticed meetings or percent of such meetings annually shall be considered to have created a vacancy in the elected position which shall be filled as provided in law
